amendment.description: Amendment provides that the Secretary require, as a condition for receiving funding under Title XIII of the Energy Independence and Security Act of 2007, that demonstration projects utilize Internet-based or other open protocols and standards if available and appropriate, and further, that grant recipients utilize Internet-based or other open protocols and standards.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 111-9 to require that the Secretary require, as a condition of receiving funding under Title XIII of the Energy Independence and Security Act of 2007, that the demonstration projects utilize Internet-based or other open protocols and standards if available and appropriate.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Markey (MA) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
